item.title: 中國考慮採取一攬子措施穩定股市
item.description:
據南方都市報，23 日券商中國援引彭博社消息，目前，中國正在考慮採取一攬子措施來穩定股市，涉及的金額比較大。但上述消息未獲官方證實。昨天晚上，國務院常務會議指出，要採取 「強有力」 的措施穩定資本市場。

On the 23rd, Chinese brokerage firm China Securities cited Bloomberg news that China is currently considering a package of measures to stabilize the stock market, involving a significant amount of funds. However, the aforementioned news has not been officially confirmed. Last night, the executive meeting of the State Council emphasized the need to take 「strong」 measures to stabilize the capital market.

item.title: 曝新版 Outlook 與 700 多家廣告商通信
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，瑞士加密郵箱開發商 Proton 近日聲稱，微軟的新版 Outlook 應用程序正在與 770 多個廣告合作伙伴進行通信。Proton 稱，新版 Outlook for Windows 應用程序會向歐盟用户彈出一個用户協議彈窗，其中提到微軟公司會與 772 個第三方共享用户的數據。只有歐盟用户能看到這個彈窗，因為歐盟《通用數據保護條例》（GDPR）強制要求 Web 服務通知用户有關數據收集和 Cookie 的信息。彈出的協議允許這些實體執行展示、衡量個性化廣告和內容、在用户設備上存儲和/或訪問信息、獲取精確的地理位置數據、通過設備掃描識別用户等操作。Proton 還表示，Microsoft Outlook 從用户處會收集多種數據，包括姓名和聯繫方式、密碼、人口統計數據、付款數據、訂閲和許可數據等等。

Swiss encrypted email provider Proton has recently claimed that Microsoft’s new version of the Outlook application is communicating with over 770 advertising partners. Proton states that the new Outlook for Windows application displays a user agreement pop-up to European Union (EU) users, mentioning that Microsoft will share user data with 772 third-party entities. Only EU users can see this pop-up as the EU’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) mandates web services to inform users about data collection and cookies. The displayed agreement allows these entities to perform activities such as displaying, measuring personalized ads and content, storing and/or accessing information on user devices, obtaining precise geolocation data, and identifying users through device scanning. Proton indicates that Microsoft Outlook collects various data from users, including names and contact information, passwords, demographic data, payment data, subscription and licensing data, and more.

item.title: 微軟正將部分「郵件和日曆」用户遷至新版 Outlook
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，微軟已開始將 「郵件和日曆」（Mail and Calendar）用户遷移到新的 Outlook 應用程序。系統會向 「郵件和日曆」 用户顯示簡短通知，之後用户將被重定向到新的 Outlook 應用，並且沒有提供停止重定向的選項。目前重定向僅為部分用户推出。微軟去年宣佈，到 2024 年底，全新的 Outlook for Windows 應用程序將替換當前的 「郵件和日曆」 應用程序。並不是所有用户都喜歡新版 Outlook 應用程序，因為新版本似乎更慢，並且不是原生的應用程序。

Microsoft has initiated the migration of 「Mail and Calendar」 users to the new Outlook application. Users of 「Mail and Calendar」 will receive brief notifications, after which they will be redirected to the new Outlook app, with no option to stop the redirection. Currently, the redirection is being rolled out to a portion of the users. Microsoft announced last year that by the end of 2024, the new Outlook for Windows application will replace the current 「Mail and Calendar」 app. However, not all users are satisfied with the new version of the Outlook app as it appears to be slower and is not a native application.

item.title: Chrome 發佈更新，修復四個安全漏洞
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，谷歌日前為 Chrome 瀏覽器發佈更新，修復了桌面版和 Android 版中的四個安全漏洞。其中一個已在野外被利用。最新版本號為 120.0.6099.234（Mac 版）、120.0.6099.224（Linux 版）、120.0.6099.224 或 120.0.6099.225（Windows 版）。谷歌公佈了其中的三個漏洞，即 CVE-2024-0517、CVE-2024-0518 和 CVE-2024-0519。谷歌確認 CVE-2025-0519 在野外被利用。其他基於 Chromium 的瀏覽器也會受到這些問題的影響，預計也將很快推出更新。

Google recently released an update for the Chrome browser, addressing four security vulnerabilities in both the desktop and Android versions. One of these vulnerabilities was being actively exploited in the wild. The latest version numbers are 120.0.6099.234 for Mac, 120.0.6099.224 for Linux, and 120.0.6099.224 or 120.0.6099.225 for Windows. Google disclosed three of the vulnerabilities as CVE-2024-0517, CVE-2024-0518, and CVE-2024-0519. Google has confirmed that CVE-2025-0519 is being actively exploited. Other Chromium-based browsers are also expected to be affected by these issues and are likely to release updates soon.

item.title: 油管將迎來裁員
item.description:
據華爾街日報，YouTube 將裁減數目不詳的職位。Alphabet 首席商務官 Mary Ellen Coe 週三在一份內部通知中宣佈了上述消息。上週，Alphabet 裁減了 1,000 多名員工。

YouTube will be cutting an undisclosed number of positions. Mary Ellen Coe, Chief Business Officer of Alphabet, announced this news in an internal memo on Wednesday. Last week, Alphabet laid off over 1,000 employees.
